00007 #include "AggrPkt.h"

00013 Aggregation::Aggregation()
00014   : BaseLayer()
00015   , destInfos()
00016   , aggregationTimer(NULL)
00017   , interPacketDelay()
00018   , nbMaxPacketsPerAggregation()
00019   , nbAggrPktSentDown(0)
00020   , nbAggrPktReceived(0)
00021 {}
00022 
00023 void Aggregation::initialize(int stage) {
00024     BaseLayer::initialize(stage);
00025   if(stage == 0) {
00026     interPacketDelay = par("interPacketDelay").doubleValue();
00027     if(interPacketDelay > 0) {
00028       nbMaxPacketsPerAggregation = par("nbMaxPacketsPerAggregation");
00029       assert(nbMaxPacketsPerAggregation > 0);
00030       aggregationTimer = new cMessage("AggregationTimer");
00031       nbAggrPktSentDown = 0;
00032       nbAggrPktReceived = 0;
00033     } else {
00034       interPacketDelay = 0;
00035     }
00036   }
00037 }
00038 
00039 bool Aggregation::isOkToSendNow(const LAddress::L3Type& dest) {
00040   bool isOkToSendNow = false;
00041   map<LAddress::L3Type, destInfo>::iterator iter = destInfos.find(dest);
00042   if(iter == destInfos.end()) {
00043     // we can send directly if we meet this node for the first time
00044     isOkToSendNow = true;
00045   } else if(destInfos[dest].first + interPacketDelay < simTime()) {
00046     // we can send directly if the interPacketDelay time has expired since last transmission
00047     isOkToSendNow = true;
00048     assert(destInfos[dest].second.size() == 0); // otherwise the aggregation timer should have fired
00049   }
00050   return isOkToSendNow;
00051 }
00052 
00053 void Aggregation::handleUpperMsg(cMessage* msg) {
00054   ApplPkt* pkt = check_and_cast<ApplPkt*> (msg);
00055   if (interPacketDelay == 0) {
00056     sendDown(msg);
00057   } else {
00058     const LAddress::L3Type& dest = pkt->getDestAddr();
00059     if (!isOkToSendNow(dest)) {
00060       // store packet
00061       destInfos[dest].second.push_back(pkt);
00062       // reschedule aggregation timer to "earliest destination"
00063       simtime_t destTxTime = destInfos[dest].first + interPacketDelay;
00064       if (aggregationTimer->isScheduled()) {
00065         if (aggregationTimer->getArrivalTime() > destTxTime) {
00066           cancelEvent( aggregationTimer);
00067           scheduleAt(destTxTime, aggregationTimer);
00068         }
00069       } else {
00070         scheduleAt(destTxTime, aggregationTimer);
00071       }
00072     } else {
00073       // send now
00074       destInfos[dest].second.push_back(pkt);
00075       sendAggregatedPacketNow(dest);
00076     }
00077   }
00078 }
00079 
00080 void Aggregation::sendAggregatedPacketNow(const LAddress::L3Type& dest) {
00081   AggrPkt* aggr = new AggrPkt("AggregationPacket", 1);
00082   aggr->setBitLength(8);
00083   int nbAggr = 0;
00084   int pktSize = 0;
00085   cObject* ctrlInfo = NULL;
00086   while(nbAggr < nbMaxPacketsPerAggregation && destInfos[dest].second.size() > 0) {
00087     pktSize = pktSize + destInfos[dest].second.front()->getByteLength();
00088     if(ctrlInfo != NULL) {
00089       delete ctrlInfo; // we delete all ctrlInfo except the last, which we attach to our message
00090     }
00091     ctrlInfo = destInfos[dest].second.front()->getControlInfo();
00092     aggr->storePacket(destInfos[dest].second.front());
00093     destInfos[dest].second.pop_front();
00094     nbAggr = nbAggr + 1;
00095   }
00096   aggr->setByteLength(pktSize); // why doesn't this compile ?
00097   aggr->setControlInfo(ctrlInfo);
00098   sendDown(aggr);
00099   destInfos[dest].first = simTime();
00100   nbAggrPktSentDown++;
00101 }
00102 
00103 void Aggregation::handleLowerMsg(cMessage * msg) {
00104   if(interPacketDelay == 0) {
00105     sendUp(msg);
00106   } else {
00107     AggrPkt* aggr = check_and_cast<AggrPkt*>(msg);
00108     while(!aggr->isEmpty()) {
00109     ApplPkt* aPacket = aggr->popFrontPacket();
00110     sendUp(aPacket);
00111     }
00112     delete aggr;
00113     nbAggrPktReceived++;
00114   }
00115 }
00116 
00117 void Aggregation::handleSelfMsg(cMessage* msg) {
00118   ASSERT(msg == aggregationTimer);
00119   // loop over all destinations
00120   // and send their packets if the time has come
00121   map<LAddress::L3Type, destInfo>::const_iterator iter = destInfos.begin();
00122   // simultaneously, compute next trigger time for aggregate timer (if required)
00123   simtime_t nextTxTime = simTime() + 2*interPacketDelay;
00124   while(iter != destInfos.end()) {
00125     if(iter->second.first + interPacketDelay <= simTime() && iter->second.second.size() > 0) {
00126       sendAggregatedPacketNow(iter->first);
00127     }
00128     if(iter->second.second.size() > 0 && iter->second.first + interPacketDelay < nextTxTime) {
00129       nextTxTime = iter->second.first + interPacketDelay;
00130     }
00131     iter++;
00132   }
00133   if(nextTxTime < simTime() + 2*interPacketDelay) {
00134     scheduleAt(nextTxTime, aggregationTimer);
00135   }
00136 }
00137 
00138 void Aggregation::finish() {
00139   // clean up memory
00140   cancelAndDelete(aggregationTimer);
00141   map<LAddress::L3Type, destInfo>::iterator iter = destInfos.begin();
00142   while(iter != destInfos.end()) {
00143     while(iter->second.second.size() > 0) {
00144       ApplPkt* pkt = iter->second.second.front();
00145       delete pkt;
00146       iter->second.second.pop_front();
00147     }
00148     iter++;
00149   }
00150   // save counter values
00151   recordScalar("nbAggrPktReceived", nbAggrPktReceived);
00152   recordScalar("nbAggrPktSentDown ", nbAggrPktSentDown);
00153 }
00154 
00155 void Aggregation::handleLowerControl(cMessage *msg) {
00156   sendControlUp(msg);
00157 }
00158 
00159 void Aggregation::handleUpperControl(cMessage *msg) {
00160   sendControlDown(msg);
00161 }
